# Peripheral Fungi
## Overview
***The following spell is available to [[Funglets|funglet]] druids, clerics and rangers.***

**Level**: 2nd
#Spell-Level/2nd

**School**: Transmutation
#Spell-School/Transmutation

**Casting Time**: 1 action

**Range**: Self

**Components**: V, S

**Duration**: Concentration, up to 10 minutes.

## Effects
Calling upon the primal power of fungus, you grow miniature [[Audire Boletus|audire boletus]] around your ears. They instantly adapt to the contours of sound waves from where you are standing when the spell is cast, granting you blindsight with a reach of 10 feet. Whenever you move more than 5 ft. in a given round, you lose this blindsight until you stand still for one round and let the fungi readjust.

***At Higher Levels.*** When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you increase the range of your blindsight by +10 feet for each spell slot above 2nd.
